00021 #include "calvin_files/parsers/test/DataGroupHeaderReaderTest.h"

00029 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00033 
00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataGroupHeaderReaderTest );
00035 
00036 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::setUp()
00037 {
00038   Fs::aptOpen(is, TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::tearDown()
00042 {
00043         is.close();
00044         fh.Clear();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::CreationTest()
00048 {
00049         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00050         fhReader.Read();
00051 
00052         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadHeaderTest()
00057 {
00058         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00059         fhReader.Read();
00060 
00061         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00062         DataGroupHeader dch;
00063         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch));
00065 
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 0);       // doesn't read in the DataSetHeader
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadOneDataGroupHeaderTest()
00073 {
00074         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00075         fhReader.Read();
00076 
00077         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00078         DataGroupHeader dch;
00079         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.Read(is, dch));
00081 
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00086 
00087         // Check that the DataSetHeader information was read.
00088         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00099 
00100         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00101         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00102         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00106         ++nvpBegin;
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00110         ++nvpBegin;
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00112 
00113         // Check the data dataSet columns
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00116 
00117         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00118         ++dphBegin;
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadMinimumInfoForOneDataGroupHeaderTest()
00123 {
00124         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00125         fhReader.Read();
00126 
00127         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00128         DataGroupHeader dch;
00129         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadMinimumInfo(is, dch));
00131 
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00136 
00137         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00138         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00148 
00149         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00150         ++dphBegin;
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00152 }
00153 
00154 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllTest()
00155 {
00156         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00157         fhReader.Read();
00158 
00159         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00160         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadAll(is, fh, fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt()));
00162 
00163         // Check some header information
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetDataGroupCnt() == 1);
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetNumDataGroups() == 1);
00166 
00167         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(fh.GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd));
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00173 
00174         // Check that the DataSetHeader information was read.
00175         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00179         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00182         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00186 
00187         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00188         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00189         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00193         ++nvpBegin;
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00197         ++nvpBegin;
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00199 
00200         // Check the data dataSet columns
00201         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00203 
00204         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00205         ++dphBegin;
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00207 
00208         // Check that there are not any more DataGroupHeaders
00209         ++dchBegin;
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin == dchEnd);
00211 }

00213 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllMinimumInfoTest()
00214 {
00215         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00216         fhReader.Read();
00217 
00218         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00219         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadAllMinimumInfo(is, fh, fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt()));
00221 
00222         // Check some header information
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetDataGroupCnt() == 1);
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetNumDataGroups() == 1);
00225 
00226         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(fh.GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd));
00228         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00229         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00230         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00231         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00232 
00233         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00234         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00244 
00245         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00246         ++dphBegin;
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00248 
00249         // Check that there are not any more DataGroupHeaders
00250         ++dchBegin;
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin == dchEnd);
00252 }
